version.changelog: - Added support for version management - will be adding auto-updater later.\n- Simplified some code using new convenience classes from Caellian Core.

- Added icons
- Added splash screen due to (in some cases) prolonged loading time
- Added .gitignore to help with project management
- Added about window accessible by clicking on program logo inside of the program.
- Made source changeable from withing program (accessed by clicking 'Generator:' inside of the main window.) - requires a restart in order for resources to load.
